actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 103-89.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 134.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.
Received in the House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.in_subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 103-591.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 328.
Mr. Vento moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Cleared for White House.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 103-280.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to remove certain restrictions from a parcel of land owned by the City of North Charleston, South Carolina, in order to permit a land exchange, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to execute instruments to remove specified deed restrictions to allow North Charleston, South Carolina, to exchange a certain parcel of land for: (1) a parcel to be used for public park or recreational purposes; and (2) sums to equalize the values of the parcels exchanged. Requires any sums received to be used only for park or recreation purposes. Retains mineral rights to the land exchanged.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain restrictions from a parcel of land owned by the City of North Charleston, South Carolina, in order to permit a land exchange, and for other purposes.
